text: U Microscopii is a Mira variable star in the constellation Microscopium. It ranges from magnitude 7 to 14.4 over a period of 334 days. The Astronomical Society of Southern Africa in 2003 reported that observations of U Microscopii were very urgently needed as data on its light curve was incomplete. ==References== Category:Mira variables Category:Microscopium Microscopii, U Category:M-type giants Category:Durchmusterung objects 194814 101063 Category:Emission-line stars
title: U Microscopii
